concept.title: Exercise a concept
concept.shortdesc: This is a concept with elements to exercise Text thanks to the Bob Ross Lorem Ipsum Generator: http://www.bobrosslipsum.com/

conbody.p: Paragraph. The first step to doing anything is to believe you can do it. See it finished in your mind before you ever start. I thought today we would make a happy little stream that's just running through the woods here.

A little happy sunlight shining through there. We don't want to set these clouds on fire. You don't have to spend all your time thinking about what you're doing, you just let it happen. It's life. It's interesting. It's fun. Volunteering your time; it pays you and your whole community fantastic dividends. Sometimes you learn more from your mistakes than you do from your masterpieces. Let's make a happy little mountain now.

li.p: Trees get lonely too, so we'll give him a little friend. And just raise cain.
That's what painting is all about. It should make you feel good when you paint.

Work on one thing at a time. Don't get carried away - we have plenty of time. When you buy that first tube of paint it gives you an artist license. We'll throw some old gray clouds in here just sneaking around and having fun.

We're not trying to teach you a thing to copy. We're just here to teach you a technique, then let you loose into the world. Trees cover up a multitude of sins. We don't make mistakes we just have happy little accidents.

conbody.p: A little happy sunlight shining through there. We don't want to set these clouds on fire. You don't have to spend all your time thinking about what you're doing, you just let it happen.
It's life. It's interesting. It's fun.
Volunteering your time; it pays you and your whole community fantastic dividends.
Sometimes you learn more from your mistakes than you do from your masterpieces.
Let's make a happy little mountain now.

li.p: Nice little clouds playing around in the sky. It's almost like something out of a fairytale book.
Anything you want to do you can do here. Isn't that fantastic? You can just push a little tree out of your brush like that. Let's put a touch more of the magic here.

You can do anything here. So don't worry about it. Just a happy little shadow that lives in there. We tell people sometimes: we're like drug dealers, come into town and get everybody absolutely addicted to painting. It doesn't take much to get you addicted.

conbody.p: A little happy sunlight shining through there. We don't want to set these clouds on fire. You don't have to spend all your time thinking about what you're doing, you just let it happen. Let's make a happy little mountain now. It's life. It's interesting. It's fun. Volunteering your time; it pays you and your whole community fantastic dividends. Sometimes you learn more from your mistakes than you do from your masterpieces. Let's make a happy little mountain now.

Sometimes you learn more from your mistakes than you do from your masterpieces. Let's make a happy little mountain now.

entry.p: There isn't a rule. You just practice and find out which way works best for you. It's hard to see things when you're too close. Take a step back and look.

All kinds of happy little splashes. Didn't you know you had that much power? You can move mountains. You can do anything. These little son of a guns hide in your brush and you just have to push them out.
That's the way I look when I get home late; black and blue.

Exercising the imagination, experimenting with talents, being creative; these things, to me, are truly the windows to your soul. Everything's not great in life, but we can still find beauty in it. Now we can begin working on lots of happy little things.

conbody.p: A little happy sunlight shining through there. We don't want to set these clouds on fire. You don't have to spend all your time thinking about what you're doing, you just let it happen. Let's make a happy little mountain now. It's life. It's interesting. It's fun. Volunteering your time; it pays you and your whole community fantastic dividends. Sometimes you learn more from your mistakes than you do from your masterpieces. Let's make a happy little mountain now.

A little happy sunlight shining through there. We don't want to set these clouds on fire. You don't have to spend all your time thinking about what you're doing, you just let it happen. Let's make a happy little mountain now. It's life. It's interesting. It's fun. Volunteering your time; it pays you and your whole community fantastic dividends. Sometimes you learn more from your mistakes than you do from your masterpieces. Let's make a happy little mountain now.

stentry.p: Anything. As long as you believe. Here we're limited by the time we have. You can't have light without dark. You can't know happiness unless you've known sorrow.

A thin paint will stick to a thick paint. Anyone can paint. In painting, you have unlimited power. You have the ability to move mountains. You can bend rivers. But when I get home, the only thing I have power over is the garbage.

In your world you have total and absolute power. If you don't think every day is a good day - try missing a few. You'll see. That's what makes life fun. That you can make these decisions. That you can create the world that you want.

This is an example of what you can do with just a few things, a little imagination and a happy dream in your heart. Use absolutely no pressure. Just like an angel's wing. Paint anything you want on the canvas. Create your own world.
That's crazy. I'm sort of a softy, I couldn't shoot Bambi except with a camera.
Just let your mind wander and enjoy. This should make you happy.
Anytime you learn something your time and energy are not wasted.
In nature, dead trees are just as normal as live trees. You have to allow the paint to break to make it beautiful.
Maybe we got a few little happy bushes here, just covered with snow. This is the way you take out your flustrations. Just think about these things in your mind and drop em' on canvas.
This is a happy place, little squirrels live here and play. You have to make these big decisions. That's a crooked tree. We'll send him to Washington.
Maybe we got a few little happy bushes here, just covered with snow. This is the way you take out your flustrations. Just think about these things in your mind and drop em' on canvas.

dlentry.dd: You have to make almighty decisions when you're the creator. It's a super day, so why not make a beautiful sky?

note.p: Note (no type attribute)
Let's give him a friend too. Everybody needs a friend. All you need to paint is a few tools, a little instruction, and a vision in your mind.

entry.p: There isn't a rule. You just practice and find out which way works best for you. It's hard to see things when you're too close. Take a step back and look.

All kinds of happy little splashes. Didn't you know you had that much power? You can move mountains. You can do anything. These little son of a guns hide in your brush and you just have to push them out.
That's the way I look when I get home late; black and blue.

Exercising the imagination, experimenting with talents, being creative; these things, to me, are truly the windows to your soul. Everything's not great in life, but we can still find beauty in it. Now we can begin working on lots of happy little things.
We don't have to be concerned about it. We just have to let it fall where it will.
It looks so good, I might as well not stop. You have to make those little noises or it won't work. I'm a water fanatic. I love water.
And right there you got an almighty cloud. Let all these things just sort of happen. Any little thing can be your friend if you let it be.
We're trying to teach you a technique here and how to use it. Isn't that fantastic?

We'll make some happy little bushes here. Absolutely no pressure. You are just a whisper floating across a mountain. These trees are so much fun. I get started on them and I have a hard time stopping.

conbody.p: whole lotta paras....

This is a happy place, little squirrels live here and play. You gotta think like a tree. This is your world, whatever makes you happy you can put in it. Go crazy. We don't want to set these clouds on fire. If you overwork it you become a cloud killer. There's nothing worse than a cloud killer. This is unplanned it really just happens. Learn when to stop.

We'll put some happy little leaves here and there. Almost everything is going to happen for you automatically - you don't have to spend any time working or worrying. Just make a decision and let it go. Let's make a happy little mountain now. Let's make some happy little clouds in our world. You've got to learn to fight the temptation to resist these things. Just let them happen. Talk to trees, look at the birds. Whatever it takes. Let's build an almighty mountain. I will take some magic white, and a little bit of Vandyke brown and a little touch of yellow.

You can't make a mistake. Anything that happens you can learn to use - and make something beautiful out of it. You can work and carry-on and put lots of little happy things in here. Just let go - and fall like a little waterfall. Decide where your cloud lives. Maybe he lives right in here. Maybe there was an old trapper that lived out here and maybe one day he went to check his beaver traps, and maybe he fell into the river and drowned .

A big strong tree needs big strong roots. Trees live in your fan brush, but you have to scare them out. Put light against light - you have nothing. Put dark against dark - you have nothing. It's the contrast of light and dark that each give the other one meaning. Let's have a happy little tree in here. You are only limited by your imagination. Of course he's a happy little stone, cause we don't have any other kind. That's a son of a gun of a cloud. The secret to doing anything is believing that you can do it. Anything that you believe you can do strong enough, you can do. Anything. As long as you believe.

Even the worst thing we can do here is good. In life you need colors. Just make little strokes like that. Isn't it fantastic that you can change your mind and create all these happy things? Let's go up in here, and start having some fun This is the time to get out all your flustrations, much better than kicking the dog around the house or taking it out on your spouse. The only prerequisite is that it makes you happy. If it makes you happy then it's good.

section.title: section with a title: Be careful. You can always add more - but you can't take it away.
section.p: Working it up and down, back and forth. Maybe there's a happy little Evergreen that lives here. Isn't that fantastic? We'll play with clouds today. Just pretend you are a whisper floating across a mountain. The first step to doing anything is to believe you can do it. See it finished in your mind before you ever start. Each highlight must have it's own private shadow. This is the fun part. Let your imagination be your guide. Now then, let's play. Paint anything you want on the canvas. Create your own world.

A big strong tree needs big strong roots. Trees live in your fan brush, but you have to scare them out. Put light against light - you have nothing. Put dark against dark - you have nothing. It's the contrast of light and dark that each give the other one meaning. Let's have a happy little tree in here. You are only limited by your imagination. Of course he's a happy little stone, cause we don't have any other kind. That's a son of a gun of a cloud. The secret to doing anything is believing that you can do it. Anything that you believe you can do strong enough, you can do. Anything. As long as you believe.

Even the worst thing we can do here is good. In life you need colors. Just make little strokes like that. Isn't it fantastic that you can change your mind and create all these happy things? Let's go up in here, and start having some fun This is the time to get out all your flustrations, much better than kicking the dog around the house or taking it out on your spouse. The only prerequisite is that it makes you happy. If it makes you happy then it's good.

section.title: a whole lotta paragraphs of different sizes and different inline markup
section.p: If you don't like it - change it. It's your world. If these lines aren't straight, your water's going to run right out of your painting and get your floor wet.
I think there's an artist hidden in the bottom of every single one of us. Don't fight it, use what happens.
We don't really know where this goes - and I'm not sure we really care. Let that brush dance around there and play. We don't have to be concerned about it. We just have to let it fall where it will.
We'll make some happy little bushes here. You can do anything here. So don't worry about it. The only thing worse than yellow snow is green snow.

Don't be afraid to make these big decisions. Once you start, they sort of just make themselves. This is an example of what you can do with just a few things, a little imagination and a happy dream in your heart. Those great big fluffy clouds.
Very easy to work these to death. La- da- da- da- dah. Just be happy. Didn't you know you had that much power? You can move mountains. You can do anything.

li.p: Just a happy little shadow that lives in there. Look around, look at what we have. Beauty is everywhere, you only have to look to see it.
And right there you got an almighty cloud.
You can get away with a lot.
And just raise cain. You can create anything that makes you happy.
Everybody's different. Trees are different. Let them all be individuals.

section.p: Even trees need a friend. We all need friends. This is your world. I really recommend you use odorless thinner or your spouse is gonna run you right out into the yard and you'll be working by yourself.
The man who does the best job is the one who is happy at his job. No worries. No cares. Just float and wait for the wind to blow you around. Let's put some happy trees and bushes back in here.
Do an almighty painting with us. Maybe we got a few little happy bushes here, just covered with snow. Fluff it up a little and hypnotize it. It's life. It's interesting. It's fun.

It's almost like something out of a fairytale book. If you've been in Alaska less than a year you're a Cheechako. How do you make a round circle with a square knife? That's your challenge for the day. Trees grow however makes them happy.

When things happen - enjoy them. They're little gifts. In painting, you have unlimited power. You have the ability to move mountains. You can bend rivers. But when I get home, the only thing I have power over is the garbage. The least little bit can do so much. It is a lot of fun. See there, told you that would be easy. I like to beat the brush.

You want your tree to have some character. Make it special. Every highlight needs it's own personal shadow. Let's make a nice big leafy tree. If what you're doing doesn't make you happy - you're doing the wrong thing.
